title: can someone please help me identify this typeface?
content:
please help me identify this font, I have been looking my whole life for my own identity and found this font on the bandana that my mom gave me when i was little and went away to camp, it would be perfect.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ronnyhorner find type.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063246/http:/typophile.com/files/ronnyhorner%20find%20type.pdf) | 1.56 MB |
author: bornvisionary

comments.content:
You are more likely to get an answer if you post your image in an easier to access format and cleaned up, like this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018063246im_/http:/typophile.com/files/RommyHorner_5127.jpg)
  
Don

You're welcome. Now who will venture a match?  
Don
